humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the tumor as 11 x 7 x 3 cm. According to the rules, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. The tumor size in this report falls within this range, making the pathologic T stage T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the tumor size is described as 11 x 7 x 3 cm. The T stage is determined by the greatest dimension of the tumor. In this case, the greatest dimension is 11 cm, which falls in the T2 category (tumor size 2.1 to 5 cm). Therefore, the T stage from this report is T2.
